data.name: X-23
data.description: X-23 is a savage Mutant Brawler who specializes in finishing off X-Force's wounded enemies.

starItems.name: X-23
starItems.description: X-23 is a savage Mutant Brawler who specializes in finishing off X-Force's wounded enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target
Always gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>290%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary target on all attacks
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.

2.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing on all attacks
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on each attack

3.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.

4.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing on all attacks
Always flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on each attack

5.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing on all attacks
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each attack

6.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned enemy for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing on all attacks
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, on the last Bonus Attack, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to that target

7.description:
Attack the most injured, non-summoned enemy for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>4</color> additional times.

If this character kills the last non-summoned enemy, repeat this attack against the most injured summoned targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each attack.
 > On the last Bonus Attack, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to that target.

1.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade: When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>

2.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus for self, <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies

3.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade: When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>

4.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus for self, <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies
While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance

5.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>140%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>140%</color> Focus.
